articles.description: Nissan has released a teaser of the upcoming Kicks compact SUV and is gearing up for its global debut on December 8, 2020.

articles.title: UK becomes first country to authorize Pfizer/BioNTech's Covid-19 vaccine, first shots roll out next week - CNN
articles.description: The United Kingdom has become the first Western nation to authorize a Covid-19 vaccine, a landmark moment in the coronavirus pandemic that paves the way for the first doses to be rolled out across the country next week.

articles.title: Is Bharti Airtel throwing good money after bad with Infratel investment? - Mint
articles.description: Airtel’s investment, despite this bleak backdrop, suggests it expects Vodafone Idea, which makes up for 40% of Infratel's revenues, to survive, even if with a much lower market share.
articles.content: Indias telecom story has been one of unexpected twists and turns for a while. Bharti Airtel Ltds recent move to increase its ownership in Bharti Infratel Ltd was something hardly anyone had foreseen.… [+2857 chars]

articles.title: RBI asks HDFC Bank to halt all launches around its Digital 2.0 initiative - Moneycontrol
articles.description: One of the largest banks in the country, HDFC Bank was facing massive customer backlash because of the frequent failures in its digital banking offerings. The RBI also asks bank to stop acquiring new credit card customers.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Singapore Approves Sale of No-Kill Lab-Grown Meat in World First - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Singapore has given US startup Eat Just the greenlight to sell its lab-grown chicken meat, in what the firm says is the world's first regulatory approval for so-called clean meat that does not come from slaughtered animals.
